title.narrative: Coop Conservation &#38;#38; Research Program Giant Pandas

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative supports giant panda conservation activities in China, including: habitat protection at the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) World Heritage listed areas at Wolong; and captive giant panda breeding and research at the Wolong Centre in Sichuan province. Activities will aim to support China in meeting identified environmental priorities including World Heritage best practice for managing and reporting on Protected Areas with a focus on ensuring benefits arising from World Heritage sites are shared with local communities. The total value of this initiative is $10.6 million over 10 years, starting 2009-10.
